6: 1 These boys are my friends. Are these boys my friends? No, these boys are not my friends.
2 This cat is black. Is this cat black? No, this cat is not black.
3 This is a black cat. Is this a black cat? No, this is not a black cat.
4 That table is brown. Is that table brown? No, that table is not brown.
5 This is a brown table. Is this a brown table? No, this is not a brown table.
6We are good friends. Are we good friends? We are not good friends.
7 The books are black. Are the books black? No, the books are not black.
